mapper.select: SELECT e.MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, e.IDX, e.USE_STATUS, e.REG_DATE, e.REG_IDX, e.UDT_DATE, e.UDT_IDX, u.NAME as regUserName, IFNULL(user.NAME,"없음") as udtUserName FROM TB_EXAM_MAIN_CATEGORY e LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON REG_IDX = u.IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER user ON UDT_IDX = user.IDX;

select e.IDX, e.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, e.USE_STATUS, e.REG_DATE, e.REG_IDX, e.UDT_DATE, e.UDT_IDX, u.NAME as regUserName, IFNULL(user.NAME,"없음") as udtUserName FROM TB_EXAM_SUB_CATEGORY e LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON REG_IDX = u.IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER user ON UDT_IDX = user.IDX;
select IDX ,SUB_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_EXAM_SUB_CATEGORY WHERE MAIN_CATEGORY_IDX = #{mainIdx};

SELECT E.IDX , E.USE_STATUS , E.REG_DATE , E.UDT_DATE , U.NAME AS REG_USER_NAME , IFNULL(USER.NAME,"수정 없음") AS UDT_USER_NAME , COUNT(TES.IDX) AS SUBJECT_COUNT , M.MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME , E.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_EXAM_SUB_CATEGORY E LEFT JOIN TB_USER U ON REG_IDX = U.IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER USER ON UDT_IDX = USER.IDX LEFT JOIN TB_EXAM_MAIN_CATEGORY M ON MAIN_CATEGORY_IDX = M.IDX LEFT JOIN TB_EXAM_SUBJECT TES ON E.IDX = TES.SUB_CATEGORY_IDX WHERE E.IDX = #{idx};
SELECT IDX ,SUBJECT_NAME FROM TB_EXAM_SUBJECT WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_IDX = #{subIdx}
SELECT IDX as subjectIdx ,SUBJECT_NAME ,SUBJECT_QUESTION_CNT FROM TB_EXAM_SUBJECT WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_IDX = #{subIdx}
